Items.Title: Oversight – Charter School Expansion in New York City
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Charter School Expansion in New York City

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the State Education Law, in relation to charter schools, by establishing siting procedures for charter schools, or alternatively to pass legislation allowing New York City to enact such a law locally.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amend the State Education Law, in relation to charter schools.

Items.Title: Oversight – Charter School Expansion in New York City
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Charter School Expansion in New York City

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the State Education Law, in relation to charter schools, by establishing siting procedures for charter schools, or alternatively to pass legislation allowing New York City to enact such a law locally.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amend the State Education Law, in relation to charter schools.
